author: Nigella Lawson
method: Place the chopped beef, gherkins, capers and shallot into a bowl and mix well. Add the mustard, Tabasco sauce, Worcestershire sauce, salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well.  To serve, spoon the steak tartare mixture onto a slice of plain or toasted dark rye or pumpernickel bread. Make a small dent in the top of the tartare and top with a fresh egg yolk. Eat immediately.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz organic beef fillet, finely chopped,  2 gherkins, finely chopped,  1 tsp capers, rinsed and drained, finely chopped,  1 shallot, finely chopped,  ½ tsp Dijon mustard ,  few drops Tabasco sauce,  ½ tsp Worcestershire sauce,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 slice dark rye or pumpernickel bread ,  1 free-range egg yolk
